query.ejb-ql: select object(o) from Tiilc_empresa o ORDER BY o.des_empresa
select object(o) from Tiilc_empresa o where o.cod_empresa = ?1
select object(o) from Tiilc_multitabla o where o.cod_mult = ?1 ORDER BY o.cod_ele
select object(o) from Tiilc_multitabla o where o.cod_mult = SUBSTRING(?1, 1,3) and o.cod_ele = SUBSTRING(?1, 4, LENGTH(?1))
select object(o) from Tiilc_multitabla o where o.valor2 = ?1
select object(o) from Tiilc_multitabla o ORDER BY o.cod_mult ASC, o.cod_ele ASC
select object(o) from Tiilc_multitabla o where o.cod_mult = ?1 and o.cod_ele = ?2
select object(o) from Tiilc_perfil o ORDER BY o.cod_perfil ASC
select object(o) from Tiilc_perfil o where o.cod_perfil = ?1
select object(o) from Tiilc_permiso_perfil o where o.tipo_acceso = ?1 and o.valor_rcp=?2
select object(o) from Tiilc_permiso_perfil o ORDER BY o.cod_perfil ASC, o.tipo_acceso ASC, o.valor_rcp ASC
select object(o) from Tiilc_permiso_perfil o where o.cod_perfil = ?1 and o.tipo_acceso = ?2 and o.valor_rcp = ?3
select object(o) from Tiilc_total o where o.ind_registro like ?1 AND o.cod_territorio like ?2 AND o.cod_oficina like ?3 AND o.cod_gestor like ?4

cmp-field.description: Generated to support relationships. Do NOT delete.

query.ejb-ql: select object(o) from Tiilc_territorio o where o.tiilc_area_fk.cod_area = ?1
select object(o) from Tiilc_territorio o order by o.des_territorio

cmp-field.description: Generated to support relationships. Do NOT delete.
Generated to support relationships. Do NOT delete.

query.ejb-ql: select object(o) from Tiilc_oficina o where o.cod_oficina = ?1
select object(o) from Tiilc_oficina o where o.tiilc_territorio_fk.cod_territorio = ?1 ORDER BY o.des_oficina

cmp-field.description: Generated to support relationships. Do NOT delete.
Generated to support relationships. Do NOT delete.
Generated to support relationships. Do NOT delete.

query.ejb-ql: select object(o) from Tiilc_gestor o where o.tiilc_oficina_fk.tiilc_territorio_fk.cod_territorio = ?2 and o.tiilc_oficina_fk.cod_oficina = ?1 ORDER BY o.nom_gestor
select object(o) from Tiilc_gestor o where o.reg_gestor = ?1
select object(o) from Tiilc_gestor o where o.tiilc_oficina_fk.tiilc_territorio_fk.tiilc_area_fk.cod_area = ?1
